definition: being a single and separate person or thing, the form of a word that is used to denote a singleton
details:
adjective
- being a single and separate person or thing
= example: being a single and separate person or thing
- beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
= synonyms: odd
- unusual or striking
= synonyms: remarkable
- grammatical number category referring to a single item or unit
- composed of one member, set, or kind
- the single one of its kind
= example: the single one of its kind
= synonyms: unique
noun
- the form of a word that is used to denote a singleton
= synonyms: singular form
